title: WhatsApp for iOS is testing chat filters for all users
content:
Popular communications platform WhatsApp is testing chat filters for all users. Currently only available for business accounts, chat filtering offers a simple and quick way to find certain chats.

description: Currently only available for WhatsApp Business accounts, chat filtering offers a simple and quick way to find certain chats.
